inputFieldTemplates.name: usageStatus
inputFieldTemplates.declaration: INPUT[inlineSelect(option(Commonly Used), option(Widely Known), option(Occasionally Used), option(Rarely Used), option(Obsolete), option(Forgotten), option(Forbidden), option(Restricted Use), option(Signature)): status]

inputFieldTemplates.name: factionStatus
inputFieldTemplates.declaration: INPUT[inlineSelect(option(Active), option(Inactive), option(Terminated), option(Dissolved), option(Declining), option(KIA, Killed in Action)):status]
